query:
UPDATE user_profile
            SET
                name = COALESCE($2, name),
                avatar_hash = COALESCE($3, avatar_hash),
                bio = COALESCE($4, bio),
                gender = COALESCE($5, gender),
                sexual_orientation = COALESCE($6, sexual_orientation),
                location = COALESCE($7, location)
            WHERE
                id = $1
